BasicInfo.short: PrivateCore enables enterprises to deploy servers in outsourced environments while maintaining data security.

Products.name: PrivateCore vCage Host
Products.description: PrivateCore vCage Host software secures server data-in-use (memory) with OS hardening and encryption

Products.name: PrivateCore vCage Manager
Products.description: PrivateCore vCage Manager software validates integrity and secures servers in untrusted environments from persistent malware
